EXT_DESC.message: Effortlessly convert any web content into Anki flashcards for smarter, faster learning.

ABOUT_DESCRIPTION.message: Anki Tool helps you create flashcards for Anki quickly and efficiently. Key features include:

DECK_SELECTION_DESC.message: Choose the Anki deck where the flashcard will be added.

CARD_TYPE_DESC.message: Select a model (Basic, Cloze, etc.) for the card format.

FRONT_BACK_DESC.message: Enter or edit content for the front and back of the flashcard.

ADD_AUDIO_DESC.message: Upload and attach audio files to a card field for sound-enhanced learning.

IMAGE_SUPPORT_DESC.message: Copy and paste images directly into the text fields to enrich flashcards visually.

SHORTCUT_DESC.message: Alt + G — Open the Anki Tool popup

SHORTCUT_DESC_SIDE_PANEL.message: Alt + B — Open the Anki Tool sidepanel

SHORTCUT_DESC_CLOSE_SIDE_PANEL.message: Alt + X — Close the Anki Tool sidepanel

SHORTCUT_INSTRUCTIONS.message: To customize the keyboard shortcut for Anki Tool, please follow these steps:

SHORTCUT_STEP_2.message: Locate Anki Tool in the list of extensions.

SHORTCUT_STEP_3.message: Click on the current shortcut for "Open the Anki Tool popup" and press your desired key combination.

SHORTCUT_STEP_4.message: Ensure that the new shortcut does not conflict with existing shortcuts.

ANKI_MESSAGE_PARAGRAPH_1.message: To use this extension, you need to have Anki and AnkiConnect installed and running. Follow these steps:

ANKI_MESSAGE_STEP_2.message: Open Anki, then go to Tools > Add-ons > Get Add-ons...

ANKI_MESSAGE_STEP_3b.message: and click OK to install AnkiConnect.

ANKI_MESSAGE_STEP_4.message: Restart Anki to complete the installation.

ANKI_MESSAGE_FINAL.message: Once you have completed these steps, reload this extension.

ADD_CARD_ERROR.message: Cannot create note because it is empty

DUPLICATE_ERROR.message: Cannot create note because it is a duplicate.

INVALID_AUDIO.message: Invalid audio data provided for upload.

RATE_PROMPT_MESSAGE.message: If you're enjoying Anki Tool, please take a moment to rate it!

HIGHLIGHT_SEND_DESC.message: Select any text on a webpage to instantly show a popup that sends it directly to a field in the extension.

LANGUAGE_DESC.message: Choose your preferred language for the interface

CLOZE_CARDS_DESC.message: Hide parts of your text to test your memory. Select any text in a field, then click C1, C2, or C3 to create a deletion. Example: Select "Paris" in "Paris is the capital of France" and click C1 to create a card showing "[...] is the capital of France" on the front. Use different numbers to create separate cards, or use C+ for auto-numbering.

CARD_PREVIEW_DESC.message: Preview how your cards will look in Anki before creating them. The preview shows both the front and back of your cards with the actual styling from your note type, so you can verify everything looks correct.

CREATE_CLOZE_MODEL_BUTTON_TITLE.message: Create a default Cloze card type

CLOZE_TOOLTIP_TEXT.message: Select text and click a C# button to create a cloze deletion. Use different numbers for separate cards, or C+ to auto-increment.

SIDE_PANEL_API_NOT_AVAILABLE.message: Side Panel API not available. Please update to Chrome 116 or later.

SIDE_PANEL_ERROR.message: An error occurred while opening the side panel (see console).

SELECT_CARD_TYPE_FIRST.message: Please select a card type first.

NO_CLOZE_DELETIONS_FOUND.message: No cloze deletions found. Please add some cloze deletions first (e.g., {{c1::text}}).

SELECT_VALID_AUDIO_FILE.message: Please select a valid audio file.

SUPPORT_CONNECT_DESC.message: Leave feedback and explore more projects

RATE_DESC.message: Enjoying Anki Tool? Leave a review on the Chrome Web Store

CONTACT_DESC.message: Have questions or feedback? I'd love to hear from you

PROJECTS_DESC.message: Discover other tools and projects I've created

CLOZE_TOOLTIP_INSTRUCTIONS.message: Select text in a field and click C1, C2, or C3 to create cloze deletions. Use C+ for auto-increment. See Settings for more details.

CLOZE_REQUIRED_ERROR.message: This is a Cloze note type, but no cloze deletions were found. Please create a cloze deletion (e.g., {{c1::text}}) in one of the fields.

AI_SELECT_DECK_MODEL.message: Please select a deck and model first.

AI_RATE_LIMIT.message: Daily AI limit reached (10 requests/day). Try again tomorrow.

AI_CONNECTION_ERROR.message: Failed to connect to AI service. Please try again later.

AI_AUTOFILL_DESC.message: Automatically fill empty card fields using AI. Simply fill in one field and let AI generate content for the others. Limited to 10 uses per day.

HIGHLIGHT_POPUP_DESC.message: Select any text on a webpage to see a floating popup with your card fields. Click a field to instantly send the selected text to it.
